title: 'Aberdeen reject Lecce bid for Ramadani'
title_page: 'Aberdeen reject Lecce bid for Ramadani' - BBC Sport
maintext:
Aberdeen have rejected a £1.1m bid for Ylber Ramadani from Lecce, while the 27-year-old midfielder is also a target for Serie A rivals Hellas Verona. (Press & Journal), external
Aberdeen have thrown out an offer of £850,000 for Ylber Ramadani from Lecce, while Serie A rivals Hellas Verona are expected to join the bidding for the Albania midfielder. (Daily Record), external
